level.heading: Annual report by Commission.
level.text: The Commission shall report each year to the Council and to the Mayor about progress in implementing the litter and solid waste reduction program and about the status of the Fund.

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see ยง 252 of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-481, Nov. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 12133, 20 STAT 4405).

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 6-84
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-84, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1001.
